Text: Well, the patch lets you bypass the license key, but then the "Create Application" is grayed out, so you can't actually compile your games when you're finished. I tried updating the software to see if it would fix this (I know) but it just breaks it even more, although the patch still works.

awesome release, thanks alot. no instructions but you have to fully install before you patch, and yes you can update the version too.

Not quite sure what licences it has but appears to have all of them. might be mistaken on this
except after you update the "target platform" dropdown box is blank and won't let you run or compile your game at all
I don't have that issue. After updating even I can compile in all platforms and demo the games.

That's weird, sorry I must have done something wrong, here's what I tried:

1. Installed GMS with the included installer in the torrent
2. Opened GMS to let it complete the installation
3. Closed GMS when it asked for license and ran Patch.exe (said "Patched Successfully")
4. Target box is blank, can create games but they won't run
5. Updated GMS and ran the patch again
6. Same deal

Is there something that I'm missing or doing wrong?
Hmmm I don't know. thats weird. uninstall and try again installing as admin. you should be able to compile in android even and thats a premium site feature.

I can't figure this out either. I've installed the basic app and it patches fine, but regardess of patched or unpatched, admin or not admin, the updated version leaves a blank Target box. I've tried to install this on another 64 bit system to no avail. Any help?
I am working on a patch for the latest version since i get them right away since i own this legit.
